title: Sentinel Devices
description: Began consulting for startup Sentinel Devices, where I worked on a software suite for zero-cloud industrial IoT devices.

title: Software Engineer II Intern at Walmart Global Tech
description: Completed my internship at Walmart Global Tech, where I worked in their Financial Technologies segment and developed Smart Suggest, an AI-powered recommendation engine.

title: Data Science Internship at Tennessee Valley Authority
description: Started my part-time internship at Tennessee Valley Authority as part of their Enterprise Analytics team.
